BSD.title: Bilsdale Tall Tower
BSD.description: Bilsdale (BSD) tall tower is in a remote area of the North York Moors National Park and is the first monitoring site in the northeast region of England.
BSD.lineage: Data were collected by the University of Bristol and deposited at the Centre for Environmental Data Analysis (CEDA) for archiving.
BSD.quality: Data are as given by the data provider, no quality control has been performed by the Centre for Environmental Data Analysis (CEDA)..
